lesson: Language for Political and Social Discourse

example.en: The legislation aims to protect human rights.
example.ar: تهدف التشريعات إلى حماية حقوق الإنسان.

words.definition: A set of ideas or a plan used by an organization or government.
words.arabic_definition: مجموعة من الأفكار أو الخطة التي تستخدمها جهة أو حكومة.

example.en: The policy focuses on climate change.

words.definition: The practice of managing relations between nations.

example.en: Diplomacy is crucial for resolving international conflicts.

words.definition: Changes made to improve a system.
words.arabic_definition: التغييرات التي يتم إجراؤها لتحسين النظام.

example.en: The government introduced a reform of the education system.
example.ar: أدخلت الحكومة إصلاحًا على نظام التعليم.

example.en: Accountability is a cornerstone of democracy.

words.definition: Support for a cause or policy.

example.en: The organization focuses on the advocacy of civil rights.
example.ar: تركز المنظمة على الدعوة لحقوق المدنيين.

words.definition: A discussion between parties aiming for agreement.
words.arabic_definition: مناقشة تهدف إلى التوصل إلى اتفاق.

example.en: The negotiations lasted for several weeks.
They worked hard to reach a consensus.

words.definition: A set of beliefs or ideas.

example.en: Each party has its own ideology.

words.definition: An organized effort to achieve a goal.

example.en: The campaign focused on climate action.
